snippet.title: Pre-registration is NOW LIVE! | Tower of Fantasy
snippet.description:
Tower of Fantasy, a shared open-world RPG, launches in Q3, 2022. Pre-registration IS NOW LIVE!! 

Pre-register here:
Official Website: https://www.toweroffantasy-global.com/en/index.html
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1601586278  
Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.levelinfinite.hotta.gp  
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2064650/  
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/tower-of-fantasy  


On this journey into the unknown,
we strive for hope, but at times, feel lost.
Don't fall here, stand strong.
With courage and companions, we traverse the twilight.
May the Star of Enlightenment light your path through the darkness.

It's time to prepare for your fantasy adventure! ⏰No need to fear the unknown - because we are always together! #ToFgether

There are multiple methods to participate in the pre-registration for the global version and claim loads of pre-registration rewards! Our game will be available on PC and Mobile. You can pre-register via our official website with your email, or add the game to your wish list on Stream and the Epic Games Store! Of course, you can search Tower of Fantasy in your App Store or Google Play Store to obtain the mobile version.

#ToF #TowerofFantasy #ToFSignal #ToFgether

▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△

▶ Join our Discord community: https://discord.gg/toweroffantasy   

You can also find us on:
▶ Twitter: https://twitter.com/ToF_EN_Official  
▶ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TowerofFantasy.Official  
     ▶ DE Page: https://www.facebook.com/TowerofFantasy.Official.DE  
     ▶ FR Page: https://www.facebook.com/TowerofFantasy.Official.FR  
     ▶ ID Page: https://www.facebook.com/TowerofFantasy.Official.ID  
     ▶ TH Page: https://www.facebook.com/TowerofFantasy.Official.TH  
▶ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/toweroffantasy_official/  
▶ Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@toweroffantasy_official
